page.title: 13MY PART-TIME JOB.
page.content: On Saturdays I have a part-time job in a hairdressers called Rough Cut in Islington.They've been there for five years,and I've been working there for ten months.Ray Rough owns the shop.I heard of the job because it was advertised in the window. I give the clients a gown and get them a tea or coffee or a magazine.I sweep all the hair from the floor and shampoo people's hair and take colour and perms out.I also put towels in the dryer and fold them and generally tidy up.Istart work at 9am and finish at about 6.30pm and I get a 30 minute break.I usually get about 10 pounds including tips.It is a long and tiring day but I enjoy it.All the staff are friendly and so are most of the customers.I get on well.
